Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw watches as the Maximals take KitKat. He hopes they are honest and help her then return her. Since he has to wait he transformes to jaguar mode, and lays down, resting.


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:The Maximal wolf looked at his Predacon opponent. He frowned but made
no sign of outward defiance.

Blackfang: We will intervene quickly and bring her back to you fully
functional. In exchange, you must not leave the area or cause trouble.
You know that an accident happens much too fast in surgeries...

With that, he transformed and took Kitkat in his arms, being careful
not to touch her where internal leaks were obvious.

Blackfang: Cam, head back to base now and warn Kenzo he's needed right
away to help this bot. Go!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> Cam::
> 
> She smiled, thinking she had actually done something important like 
> find a bot that looked like her and fought for it.  She trotted over 
> to Blackfang "Come on. Let's take her home."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > : : SharpClaw : :
> > SharpClaw grew angry when Cam declared that KitKat was theirs by 
> way of "findersw keepers," but he kept his cool. He had to think 
> things over. He did not want to fight here. Blackfange looked to be a 
> formidable enemy, KitKat needed immediate medical care and could not 
> be put at risk, and there was a child present.
> > 
> > SharpClaw: Very well. I'll let you take her, but only if you get 
> her help quickly. She looks to be in bad shape.
> >
